players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: " I am concerned about Charlie's innocence claim and would like to know more about his alibi for the time Alice was killed."
Charlie: "Charlie is the mafioso and he killed Alice. I have an alibi for the time Alice was killed, but revealing it would compromise my position as the mafioso."
